siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan is trying to figure out what kind of headphones to buy. September is turning out to be expensive for him due to the tech toy purchases. In the mission to try and review milkshakes and weird menu items (like the impossible whopper.) Jon felt the need to orderâ€¦
